Let's Grunthttps://blog.test:8443/2018/04/grunt/Thu, 26 Apr 2018 00:00:00 +0000https://blog.test:8443/2018/04/grunt/Grunt is a JavaScript/Node.js based task runner in some ways very similar to Makefile and Apache Ant. It requires Node.js beforehand, just like Ant needs a Java Runtime. After installing Node.
